```{r read}
filmes = read_imported_data()
```

```{r read}
filmes_transform = filmes %>% 
    mutate(bilheteria_log_scaled = as.vector(scale(log10(bilheteria))),
           avaliacao_scaled = as.vector(scale(avaliacao)))
```

```{r read}
plot_clusgap = function(clusgap, title = "Gap Statistic calculation results") {
    require("ggplot2")
    gstab = data.frame(clusgap$Tab, k = 1:nrow(clusgap$Tab))
    p = ggplot(gstab, aes(k, gap)) + geom_line() + geom_point(size = 5)
    p = p + geom_errorbar(aes(ymax = gap + SE.sim, ymin = gap - SE.sim), width = .2)
    p = p + ggtitle(title)
    return(p)
}
```

```{r read}
gaps <- filmes_transform %>% 
    select(avaliacao_scaled, bilheteria_log_scaled) %>% 
    clusGap(FUN = kmeans, nstart = 20, K.max = 8, B = 200)
plot_clusgap(gaps)
```

```{r}
n_clusters = 5
# O agrupamento de fato:
km = filmes_transform %>% 
    select(bilheteria_log_scaled, avaliacao_scaled) %>% 
    kmeans(centers = n_clusters, nstart = 20)

agrupado = km %>% 
    augment(filmes_transform)

agrupado %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = avaliacao_scaled, y = bilheteria_log_scaled, color = .cluster))  + 
    geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.6) + 
    geom_enc

x = ggscatter(agrupado, x="avaliacao_scaled", y="bilheteria_log_scaled", color=".cluster", size = 2, alpha = 0.6)+
    stat_chull(aes(fill= .cluster), alpha= 0.1, geom="polygon") +
    xlab("Avaliação") +
    ylab("Bilheteria")

ggplotly(x)
```
